name: simplexml
description: Simple and easy json to xml converter
readme:
# simplexml

Simple and easy json to xml converter

## Getting Started
Install the module with: `npm install simplexml`

```javascript
var simplexml = require('simplexml');
var json = {
  fname: 'Rn',
  lname: 'Bo'
}
var xml = simplexml.toXML(json, [opts]);
```
